name: Rob (PedroVMVictor, Dani_Costa, VictorNovaisUX, Lefumis)
description:
Inspired by games like Limbo, Alan Wake, Little Nightmares and Megaman. Rob is a platformer puzzle game about a lonely robot that lost all of his memory and empathy, now Rob needs to find a way to recover his memory to remember what he can do and who he really is.  

Made during Global Game Jam 2021. 

Credits

Art- Breno Souza Pereira
Music & SFX- Daniel Costa 
Programming- Pedro Vinícius De Marco Victor
UX- Victor de Moraes Fossa Novais 

Special thanks- Erick Marcel da Silva & Lia Shizue Pauli Fuziy
